bio:
Miraette lives in Solitude, the provincial capital city of Skyrim. She works as one of the barmaids at the Winking Skeever, a popular inn/tavern. Miraette's boss (the owner of the Winking Skeever) is an Imperial man named Corpulus Vinius. Corpulus is assisted in running the inn by his young adult son Sorex and capable younger daughter Minette. Rina (a Breton), Kirginne (a Nord), and Suleen (an Altmer) are Miraette's barmaid co-workers at the tavern. Bards from Solitude's Bards College (such as a cheerful woman named Lisette) often play music at the tavern.
Miraette is a young Imperial woman with dirty blonde hair and bright green eyes. She usually wears a somewhat revealing barmaid outfit, typical of barmaids in Skyrim. She typically works the later shift at the tavern with Suleen. When working, Miraette walks around the tavern serving drinks and food.
name: Miraette
